item.title: Man thought he won $96 playing lottery game, but he won much more than that
item.description: A man in Kentucky knew he was going home with a prize after playing a Kentucky Lottery draw game ticket, but he wasn’t aware of how big a jackpot he won.

item.title: Bradenton Police warn of email scam involving city permit invoices
item.description: Officials say the scammers are impersonating City staff, claiming extra payments are required and demanding wire transfers for permit payments.

item.title: Tropical Storm Fernand Update - 5 AM Sunday
item.description: Fernand is a weak "fish-storm" in the Atlantic

item.title: T.S. Fernand 5pm Update
item.description: Fernand remains at tropical storm strength in the Atlantic moving towards the NNE at 13 mph.

item.title: Tropical Storm Fernand 11pm Update
item.description: Fernand has maximum sustained winds of 50mph.

item.title: Scattered showers continue Monday, dry air enters by the midweek
item.description: A 60% chance of rain is expected.

item.description: Sarasota County Sheriffs say a child pulled into the drainage system.

item.title: ‘Live life good’ Suncoast resident turns 105; shares her best advice
item.description: Miss Winnie told ABC7 the secret to a long full life is to “Live life good and love your family.”
